title: [求助]启动不了游戏
author: jiangzizhong
txt_content:
错误代码：      Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: Could not load library. Reasons: [no jansi in java.library.path, 系统找不到指定的路径。]

    at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)

    at org.apache.logging.log4j.core.selector.ClassLoaderContextSelector.locateContext(ClassLoaderContextSelector.java:217)

    at org.apache.logging.log4j.core.impl.Log4jContextFactory.getContext(Log4jContextFactory.java:34)     
    at org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager.getLogger(LogManager.java:387)

replies.author: g1186157789
replies.txt_content:
设置JAVA内存大小
看下JAVA是否32位或64位
根据电脑配置及位数来定

replies.author: yuudachi
replies.txt_content: 库文件没有下载完全，请使用启动器下载（可能需要挂VPN）

replies.author: 呆瓜Domado
replies.txt_content: 你确认你下载了完整资源文件吗

replies.author: 寒枫★Da_Da
replies.txt_content:
小星啊啊啊 发表于 2016-8-9 12:05
资源不完整
建议你去下一个HMCL的启动器  可以用那个启动器来下载完整的客户端资源
